claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela  (  -LSB- mænˈdɛlə -RSB- 18 July 1918 -- 5 December 2013  )  was a South African anti-apartheid revolutionary , politician , and philanthropist , who served as President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ideologically an African nationalist and socialist , he served as President of the African National Congress  (  ANC  )  party from 1991 to 1997 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Influenced by Marxism , he secretly joined the banned South African Communist Party  (  SACP  )  .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: `` Nelson Mandela ''  (  known in some versions as `` Free Nelson Mandela ''  )  is a song written by British musician Jerry Dammers , and performed by band The Special A.K.A. -- with lead vocal by Stan Campbell -- released on the single `` Nelson Mandela '' / `` Break Down The Door '' in 1984 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nelson Mandela International Day  (  or Mandela Day  )  is an annual international day in honour of Nelson Mandela , celebrated each year on 18 July , Mandela 's birthday .
